source: TEXT_BANAMA110_01231_SEQ_00<tab>Fibubb Gah wishes to entrust you with a new task.
target: TEXT_BANAMA110_01231_SEQ_00<tab>灰の陣営のフィブブ・ガーには、果たすべき使命があるようだ。

source: TEXT_BANAMA110_01231_SEQ_01<tab>Fibubb Gah has bid you strike out at the unholy altars of the Brotherhood's hated kin. Locate and destroy the flaming beacons in the west of Zahar'ak.
target: TEXT_BANAMA110_01231_SEQ_01<tab>フィブブ・ガーの依頼を受けた。ザハラク戦陣の西にある「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2056E01 /var>」を2基破壊しよう。

source: TEXT_BANAMA110_01231_SEQ_02<tab>You have destroyed the flaming beacons. Return to the Ring of Ash and report to Fibubb Gah.
target: TEXT_BANAMA110_01231_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2056E01 /var>を破壊した。灰の陣営の「フィブブ・ガー」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_BANAMA110_01231_SEQ_03<tab>Fibubb Gah praises your worthy display of courage. Though the warrior exults at the blow you have struck for the Brotherhood, he warns that the fallen Amalj'aa will not be so easily dissuaded from their mad pursuit for power.
target: TEXT_BANAMA110_01231_SEQ_03<tab>フィブブ・ガーに報告した。冒険者の戦いぶりに、フィブブ・ガーは深く感謝しているようだ。いずれ同じようなことがあった場合も期待していると彼は語った。
TEXT_BANAMA110_01231_TODO_00<tab>ザハラク戦陣西の<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2056E01 /var>を破壊

source: TEXT_BANAMA110_01231_FIBUBBGAH_000_001<tab>Be they ten thousand strong, the mewling whelps of Zahar'ak could not stand before us without the invigorating strength of their deity's flames.
target:
TEXT_BANAMA110_01231_FIBUBBGAH_000_001ザハラク戦陣の者どもの力の源……
これ、焔神の放ちし邪な炎なり。

source: TEXT_BANAMA110_01231_FIBUBBGAH_000_002<tab>They carefully capture the Lord of the Inferno's searing exhalations, and harness them for their unholy rites.
target:
TEXT_BANAMA110_01231_FIBUBBGAH_000_002きゃつらは、かつて呼び出した焔神の吐きし炎を
密かに隠し持ち、ひとつの術式を組み上げん。

source: TEXT_BANAMA110_01231_FIBUBBGAH_000_003<tab>The god-touched fires are then ensconced within towering altars, which radiate Ifrit's blessings upon all within reach.
target:
TEXT_BANAMA110_01231_FIBUBBGAH_000_003そして、その炎を用意したまじないの聖火台に灯し、
焔神の加護を増さんと欲す。

source: TEXT_BANAMA110_01231_FIBUBBGAH_000_004<tab>These flaming beacons must be destroyed! The Brotherhood of Ash will take from our vile kin every symbol of their undeserved strength!
target:
TEXT_BANAMA110_01231_FIBUBBGAH_000_004「」を破壊せよ！
これこそ我らが「灰の一党」の使命！
惰弱の産物たる炎を、この世から絶やさん！

source: TEXT_BANAMA110_01231_FIBUBBGAH_000_006<tab>I entrust this task to you, honored ally. But be forewarned: the sentinels that guard these beacons stand closest to the source of their power, and will prove to be most fierce adversaries.
target:
TEXT_BANAMA110_01231_FIBUBBGAH_000_006……されど、注意めされよ。
聖火台は敵軍の要、それを守るアマルジャ族は強敵ぞ。
重々に注意してかかるものだと心得られたし。

source: TEXT_BANAMA110_01231_FIBUBBGAH_000_011<tab>Destroy these flaming beacons, honored ally! The symbols of our honorless kin's madness cannot be suffered to exist!
target:
TEXT_BANAMA110_01231_FIBUBBGAH_000_011「」を破壊せよ！
これこそ我らが「灰の一党」の使命！
惰弱の産物たる炎を、この世から絶やさん！

source: TEXT_BANAMA110_01231_FIBUBBGAH_000_012<tab>A worthy display of courage, honored ally. May our enemies know that even their precious beacons be not safe from our wrath!
target:
TEXT_BANAMA110_01231_FIBUBBGAH_000_012戻ったか、強き者よ！
の破壊、真に御苦労なり！
観感興起、貴公の勇戦に称賛を！

source: TEXT_BANAMA110_01231_FIBUBBGAH_000_013<tab>...But lust for power is not so easily dampened. Until our war is won, I fear we will need to break these infernal altars again and again...
target:
TEXT_BANAMA110_01231_FIBUBBGAH_000_013……されど、きゃつらの奸計、いまだ尽きず。
いずれはまた同じようなことがあらん。
その時は、再び貴公の力を借りることになろう。
